scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary seated on a golden chair, holding the Christ Child. An angel, kneeling before them, offers a basket. The background is a richly patterned tapestry of gold, red, and blue diamonds, with a blue border above. The figures are rendered with halos, indicating their sacred status. The Virgin Mary is dressed in a blue robe, and the Christ Child is depicted as a young boy. The angel has large red and yellow wings and wears a white robe. The floor is tiled with a yellow diamond pattern. The overall impression is one of divine presence and gentle interaction.
